headlines.description: Brentford claimed their first away victory in the Premier League with a 2-0 success at Wolverhampton Wanderers on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Toney scores, assists as Brentford beat Wolves

headlines.description: — Martin Odegaard’s first-half free kick clinched Arsenal a 1-0 win at Burnley, whose winless home run in the English Premier League was extended to 13 matches on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Odegaard's free kick earns Arsenal 1-0 win at Burnley in EPL

headlines.description: Sadio Mane scored his 100th goal for Liverpool as they eased to a 3-0 victory over Crystal Palace at Anfield on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mane nets 100th Liverpool goal in win vs. Palace

headlines.description: Manchester City needed the help of VAR to save them from a home defeat to Southampton in a game which finished 0-0.
headlines.shortLinkText: VAR rescues Man City in 0-0 draw with Saints

headlines.description: Watford beat Norwich City 3-1 away on Saturday to extend the Canaries' winless run to five Premier League matches.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sarr double for Watford keeps Norwich winless

headlines.description: — Leon Bailey’s explosive 20-minute cameo propelled Aston Villa to a 3-0 win over Everton in the English Premier League as Rafa Benitez slumped to his first loss in charge of the visitors on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bailey's cameo inspires Villa to 3-0 win over Everton in EPL
